name: Alternate Air, Inc.
about: Alternate Air, Inc., based at Seattle's King County International Airport/Boeing Field, has been a licensed Washington State for-profit corporation since May 1995. We operate with a strong commitment to integrity and honesty, offering a membership-based model with a non-refundable initiation fee and monthly dues. Our fleet, mostly owned by the company, provides a cost-effective and reliable training environment. With highly qualified and passionate certified flight instructors, we tailor training to individual learning styles and pace under FAA Part 61 regulations. Located conveniently just south of downtown Seattle, our training setting ensures students are comfortable flying at any airport in the country. We pride ourselves on affordable rental costs and a relaxed atmosphere, making us an ideal choice for those seeking to achieve their aviation goals. At Alternate Air, we are dedicated to helping you become a competent and safe aviator.
services:

Flight Instructor CFI
